Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

St François de Paule marchant sur les flots, S. 175/2 bis

c. 1863–1866 · LW A219 · R. 17

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Liszt wrote versions of the Deux Légendes for piano (S. 175; LW A219; R. 17) and for orchestra (S. 113a; LW G27; R. 440). He also made a simplified piano version of the second (S. 175/2 bis; LW A219; R. 17).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/10 · Z. A/B 8459 · Various Cyclical Works II · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok
  • Editio Musica Budapest · Z. 12313 · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok / Adrienne Kaczmarczyk

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3.5
